content: a few years ago i designed a cable knit beanie pa cid 425 ern the favorite cable beanie and it became an instant best-seller i was thrilled that so many people loved my design so i began thinking of other ways i could use the unique cable s cid 415 tch pa cid 425 ern that i created lo and behold the favorite cable headband was born it was originally designed for the most recent our maker life book and i m fi- nally ge cid 427 ng around to having it available on ravelry as well it s the perfect piece to wear as the weather transi cid 415 ons from cool end-of-summer days to chilly autumn nights it would look amazing paired with your coziest flannel shirt and messy bun but you can style it so many different ways the favorite cable headband is a very quick project featuring a squishy combina cid 415 on of thick and thin cables that are fun to look at and to knit worked in the worsted weight yarn of your choice this piece is perfect for beginner kni cid 425 ers i have included a helpful photo tutorial for those who may not have knit cables before and it s a small project so it won t hurt too much if you have to rip it out and start over that probably won t happen i believe in you the yarn featured in this design is three irish girls springvale worsted a beau cid 415 ful hand-dyed super- wash merino from my local yarn shop stars hollow yarns i recently got a job there on weekends and i am having the cid 415 me of my life you can shop both in-store and online so even if you aren t local you can s cid 415 ll purchase the yarn used in the pa cid 425 ern or choose from a variety of other high-quality worsted weight yarns i was able to make both this headband and a pair of favorite cable mi cid 425 s with the same skein of yarn you are more than welcome to sell anything you make using this pa cid 425 ern i just ask that you credit me as the designer and include the link to the pa cid 425 ern on ravelry you may not claim this pa cid 425 ern as your own and you may not sell or distribute its contents in any form if you have any ques cid 415 ons you can reach me at thechesapeakeneedle@gmail com copyright september 2022 all rights reserved approx
